text: Ernest Meighan (15 June 1971 - 9 August 2014) was a Belizean former cyclist. He competed in two events at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Belizean male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Belize Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1998 Commonwealth Games Category:Cyclists at the 2002 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Belize Category:Place of birth missing
title: Ernest Meighan
